# [Interview #469: TGS Signing Report - Yellowbeard, Entry #3](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=469#3)

#### Yellowbeard

Harriet liked the Monty Python Black Knight t-shirt I wore, "just a flesh wound".
